name: Tile Trial
description:
Can you complete the trial?

Work your way through each floor of the Tile Trial Tower, and change each tile green - but don't touch any green tiles or you'll have to start over!
Special Credits
Music: 'A Test Of Time" by Chance De La Soul, Under CC-BY 4.0 (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/). (a href="Source" class="redactor-linkify-object">https://opengameart.org/content/a-test-of-time-chiptune">Source

Controls

Mouse/Touch/Arrow Keys (Left, Right, Up, Down)

Check out more games at www.mountgamer.com!
